Name: Som Tum Salad
Description: Unripe Papaya, carrots, tomatoes, ginger, coriander, peanuts, sesame seeds and Tamarind  dressing(contains green chilly and garlic)

Name: Pita Falafel and Hummus Platter
Description: This delicious platter includes 2 whole wheat pitas, 4 baked falafels, a fresh side salad, and 2 types of creamy hummus.

Name: Mooli Paratha
Description: 2 Parathas with Mooli and Onion Filling. Served with Mixed Pickle and Curd.

Name: Vegan Tofu Bhurji With Millet Dosa
Description: A perfect combination of protein-rich tofu and wholesome gluten-free millet dosa for a delicious and nourishing experience. Dosa is made-up of Ragi, Buckwheat, Jawar and Little Millets.

Name: Hummus And Chicken Wrap [2 Wraps]
Description: House made Whole Wheat tortilla wrap containing baby spinach, onion, tomato, cucumber jalapeno, harissa chicken, hummus.

Name: Vanilla Cloud Smoothie
Description: The ultimate good-for-you dessert! Vanilla Cloud contains cashew milk, vanilla extract, banana, maple honey. If drinking at night do give it 3 hour to ensure full digestion!

Name: Pesto Chicken Sandwich
Description: Jumbo sandwich bread filled with smoked chicken, Iceberg lettuce, red onion and pesto spread.

Name: Earth Bowl Salad
Description: quinoa + pearl barley, lettuce, tomatoes, corns, organic chickpeas, spicy broccoli, cottage cheese, pesto vinaigrette.

Name: Quesadillas
Description: 2 Quesadillas are served in one portion. Quesadillas are corn tortilla with melted cheese and tangy corn, beans stuffing.

Name: Farm Veggie Quinoa With Black Pepper Sauce
Description: Try our Farm Veggie Quinoa Bowl with umami Black Pepper Sauce for a healthy and flavorful meal. Fresh veggies, tender quinoa, and our delicious sauce make it the perfect balance of taste and nutrition.

Name: Grilled Tofu & Veggies In Italian Sauce
Description: Grilled Tofu along with sauteed vegetables in Italian Red Sauce served with Brown Rice.

Name: Pink Sauce Pasta
Description: Choice of pasta tossed in mix of  tangy red tomato sauce and topped with creamy white sauce. Served along with sauteed vegetables, and garlic bread.

Name: Sarso Da Saag Makki Di Roti
Description: A delectable dish of mustard green leaves curry, infused with aromatic spices and tangy flavors, is the perfect accompaniment for the soft and fluffy cornmeal rotis, generously slathered with butter and sprinkled with jaggery powder.

Name: High Protein Sattu Paratha
Description: Made with a blend of roasted chickpeas and spices, our sattu filling is packed with protein and flavor. Our paratha is made with whole wheat flour and cooked to perfection on a hot griddle, making it crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. 2 Paratha with curd.

Name: Vegan Tofu Bhurji With Beetroot Millet Dosa
Description: A perfect combination of protein-rich tofu and wholesome gluten-free millet dosa for a delicious and nourishing experience. Dosa is made-up of Ragi, Buckwheat, Jawar and Little Millets.

Name: Sabzi Salad Wrap [2 Wraps]
Description: House made Whole Wheat tortilla wrap containing baby spinach + shredded lettuce, spicy quinoa, spicy broccoli, raw beets, carrots, sprouts, tofu.

Name: Iron & C Booster Smoothie
Description: Experience the ultimate powerhouse of nutrition with our Iron Boost smoothie. Packed with dark leafy greens like spinach and Vitamin C-rich fruits like kiwis, this smoothie is the perfect blend to ensure optimal absorption of iron in your body.

Name: Grilled Vegetables Sandwich
Description: Jumbo sandwich bread filled with grilled exotic vegetables, and Harissa spread.

Name: Sambar With Rawa Appe
Description: South Indian Staple, Sambar served along with Rawa Appe(golf ball shaped pan fried cakes) crispy on the outside and soft in the inside.

Name: Koshari
Description: This National dish of Egypt and a popular street food is a very tempting, Healthy, and a great Vegan option! Consisting the layers of flavoured Rice Pilaf, sprouted Lentils, Pasta, Chickpeas, zesty tomato sauce and topped with house spices.

Name: Grilled Paneer & Veggies In Italian Sauce
Description: Grilled Paneer along with sauted vegetables in Italian Red Sauce served with Brown Rice.

Name: Aloo Payaz Paratha
Description: 2 Parathas with Potato and Onion Filling. Served with Mixed Pickle and Curd.

Name: Soya Bhurji with Millet Dosa
Description: A perfect combination of protein-rich Soya Granule bhurji and wholesome gluten-free millet dosa for a delicious and nourishing experience. Dosa is made-up of Ragi, Buckwheat, Jawar and Little Millets.

Name: Middle Eastern Wrap [2 Wraps]
Description: House made Whole Wheat tortilla wrap containing chopped romaine, herb falafel, local feta, tomatoes, red onion, cucumbers, house-made hummus and yogurt.

Name: Apple Pie Smoothie
Description: Indulge in our delicious apple pie smoothie, packed with a healthy dose of probiotics and an abundance of vitamins and minerals. This perfect breakfast, snack, or dessert features seasonal apples, a hint of cinnamon, and all the benefits of Yogurt.

Name: Paneer Cheese Sandwich
Description: Jumbo sandwich bread filled with shredded paneer, bell peppers, onions, cheese and seasoned with our special seasoning.

Name: Couscous Salad
Description: couscous, bell peppers, lettuce mix, tomatoes, feta, shredded carrots, sweetcorn, carrot chili vinaigrette

Name: Rice Noodles Bowl
Description: Rice noodles, roasted tofu, cucumber, carrot, baked beans, sesame seeds with peanut sauce.

Name: Red Thai Curry
Description: Red Thai Curry with sauted vegetable served with aromatic Basil Rice.

Name: Pasta In Alferado Sauce
Description: Choice of pasta tossed in creamy white sauce. Served along with sauteed vegetables, and garlic bread.

Name: Egg Paratha
Description: 2 Parathas with Egg Filling. Served with Mixed Pickle and Curd.

Name: Spicy Thai Wrap [2 Wraps]

Name: Soya Bhurji with Beetroot Millet Dosa
Description: A perfect combination of protein-rich Soya Granule bhurji and wholesome gluten-free millet dosa for a delicious and nourishing experience. Dosa is made-up of Ragi, Buckwheat, Jawar and Little Millets.

Name: Anti- Aging Smoothie
Description: Our natural and healthy smoothie, made with grapes, apples, and curd, is packed with antioxidants, vitamins, potassium. Enjoy the benefits of reduced cholesterol levels and slowed aging with every sip!

Name: Falafel Hummus Sandwich
Description: Jumbo sandwich bread filled with Falafel, onion, tomatoes, cucumber and hummus spread.

Name: Elote Bowl Salad

Name: Dal Makhani(Low Fat) With Laccha Prantha

Description: House made harissa rub marinated chicken, grilled to perfection, served with our special burnt garlic tzatziki sauce along with delicious as well as nutritious couscous salad.

Name: Chicken Fajita Bowl

Name: Pasta In Arrabbiata Sauce
Description: Choice of pasta tossed in tangy red tomato sauce. Served along with sauteed vegetables, and garlic bread.

Name: Egg Bhurji with Millet Dosa

Name: Classic Peanut Butter & Banana Smoothie
Description: Old and classic energy booster and protein replenisher smoothie with peanut butter, banana, milk or yogurt and to provide a kick, cocoa!

Name: Bombay Masala Sandwich
Description: Savor the spicy and aromatic flavors of Mumbai with our Bombay Masala Sandwich. Made with a mouth-watering combination of toasted bread, Potatoes, tomatoes, onions, and a delectable masala spice mix, this sandwich is the perfect blend of savory and satisfying.

Name: Spicy Thai Salad
Description: Roasted sesame tofu, corns, cucumbers, shredded red cabbage, cilantro, spicy sunflower seeds, peanut, chopped romaine, lime squeeze, spicy peanut dressing

Name: Kadhai Panner With Laccha Prantha
Description: Freshly sautéed Paneer, bell-peppers and onion simmered in rich tomato gravy and roasted spices served with Whole Wheat Laccha Prantha.

Name: High Fiber Vegetarian Steak
Description: Green lentil, brown rice, spinach, and broccoli steak, grilled and served with umami black pepper sauce, and saute exotic vegetables.

Name: Berry Blast Smoothie

Featuring the perfect blend of fresh and crisp apples, sweet and crunchy carrots, and earthy and vibrant beetroot, this smoothie is packed with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants that are essential for a healthy and active lifestyle.
